DataElement.preferredName: Patient Autoimmune Disease Laboratory Evidence Inclusion Criteria Eligibility Determination Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no indicator related to a patient's eligibility based on lab evidence that shows the presence of autoimmune disease.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Autoimmune Disease Laboratory Evidence Inclusion Criteria Eligibility Determination
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Individuals participating in the health care system for the purpose of receiving therapeutic, diagnostic, or preventive procedures._A condition in which the body recognizes its own tissues as foreign and directs an immune response against them._A facility equipped and competent to conduct scientific experiments, observations, tests, investigations, and/or to manufacture chemicals or medical products._Knowledge on which to base belief._Criteria to determine eligibility of patients for medical care programs and services._Medical and/or social characteristics which are necessary for a subject to be allowed to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. Meeting inclusion criteria is not a sufficient condition for entry or recruitment of a subject into the study. Characteristics limiting the eligibility of a subject for the clinical study must be considered.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Individuals participating in the health care system for the purpose of receiving therapeutic, diagnostic, or preventive procedures.

Concepts.definition: Individuals participating in the health care system for the purpose of receiving therapeutic, diagnostic, or preventive procedures.

Property.preferredName: Autoimmune Disease Laboratory Evidence Inclusion Criteria Eligibility Determination
Property.preferredDefinition: A condition in which the body recognizes its own tissues as foreign and directs an immune response against them.:A facility equipped and competent to conduct scientific experiments, observations, tests, investigations, and/or to manufacture chemicals or medical products. :Knowledge on which to base belief.:The addition of somebody or something to, or the presence of somebody or something in, a group or mixture, particularly, a passive, usually temporary, product of cell activity within the cytoplasm or nucleus.:Criteria to determine eligibility of patients for medical care programs and services.

Concepts.definition: A disorder resulting from loss of function or tissue destruction of an organ or multiple organs, arising from humoral or cellular immune responses of the individual to his own tissue constituents. It may be systemic (e.g., systemic lupus erythematosus), or organ specific, (e.g., thyroiditis).
A facility equipped and competent to conduct scientific experiments, observations, tests, investigations, and/or to manufacture chemicals or medical products.
Knowledge on which to base belief.

Medical and/or social characteristics which are necessary for a subject to be allowed to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. Meeting inclusion criteria is not a sufficient condition for entry or recruitment of a subject into the study. Characteristics limiting the eligibility of a subject for the clinical study must be considered.
The act of determining if a subject is suitable for enrollment in a study according specific protocol criteria and procedures.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Presence of laboratory eviden
ReferenceDocuments.description: Presence of laboratory evidence of autoimmune disease (e.g., positive antinuclear antibody [ANA] titer) without associated symptoms
